mapper.select: SELECT r.userRegCode ,r.mainBusinessCode ,r.userLevelCode ,r.userId ,r.userPw ,r.userName ,r.userGender ,r.userAddr ,r.userMoblie ,r.userEmail ,r.userPosition ,r.userRegDate ,r.userRegStatus ,r.userRegComment FROM k1_tb_user_register AS r;

SELECT userRegCode ,mainBusinessCode ,userLevelCode ,userId ,userPw ,userName ,userGender ,userAddr ,userMoblie ,userEmail ,userPosition ,userRegDate ,userRegStatus ,userRegComment FROM k1_tb_user_register WHERE userRegCode = #{userRegCode};
